results.title: Presentation techniques
results.brief_description: Provides materal suitable for assisting teachers to develop the skills they need in the presentation of Direct Instruction Materials. Notes scripts and formats, signals and group responses, how to present a lesson, how to practice on one’s own, how to use sample lessons and the importance of corrections. No other credits available

results.title: Prescription for two: an oldtime comedy
results.brief_description: An oldtime silent comedy. A continually arguing couple are told separately by medical friends that the other has a heart complaint and must be treated with care. This works for a short time until they both discover the ruse. However, they then both really do believe that they each have a heart complaint and call another doctor for his advice. His solution is to give them a prescription for two for living happily together. No credits.

results.title: Preparing for Sarah. Parts 1 and 2
results.brief_description: Three mothers are followed from the time their pregnancies are confirmed to the day they meet with their husbands and babies in the park. The first part of the film deals with aspects of ante-natal care. The second part shows the actual birth and after care.

results.title: Preparing for disaster
results.creator_credit: Katie Jennings and KCTS (Television station : Seattle, Wash.)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Fire on the rim”.
People have devised many methods of surviving the upheavals in the “ring of fire”. In Alaska, earthquakes are so extreme, that it is an ideal location for continuous research. In Chile and Hawaii, research focuses on ocean and tidal problems. Japan and New Zealand offer insight into anti-quake designs. In San Francisco, planning, communication, training and organisation have assisted in reducing risk to life and property, as well as preparing for future problems.

results.title: Preparing and conducting an interview
results.creator_credit: Justin Shortal and Video Education Australasia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Finding out”.
Kylie’s class has been set the task of recording an interview with an aspect of their own choice. We follow Kylie’s progress as she moves through a process of preparing and conducting an interview.

results.title: Preparing a cupola for charging
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Foundry Practice”.
Explains how to recognise the end of a heat; the procedure for dropping bottom; and the procedures for preparing a cupola for its next heat.

results.title: Prepare to dive
results.brief_description: The training of Australia’s new submarine corps. Initial training takes place on HMS Dolphin stationed in England, from where they are often posted to HMS Maidstone in Scotland. These highly trained men are bringing a new power to Australia’s defence.
